document.full_text: more than 500 people were killed in post-election violence last week in the mostly muslim north, a nigerian human rights group said on sunday, and it warned of further unrest during state elections.
document.title: nigeria rights group says over 500 killed in riots
lines_and_colors: more than 500 people were killed in post-election violence last week in the mostly muslim north, a nigerian human rights group said on sunday, and it warned of further unrest during state elections.
